response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will significantly benefit your endeavors. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $750,000. This special offer is designed to ensure you receive the best possible value while also allowing me to maximize the return on this esteemed item. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information.", "product_price": 750000}
